mails.subject: Need Remedy for Common Cold, Flu, Respiratory Issues & Weakness
mails.body:
Dear Healer,

I have been suffering from common cold, flu, respiratory issues, and weakness for the past few days. My body feels tired, and my breathing is not as easy as before. I need a remedy that can help me recover quickly.

Please provide the right medicine.

- A Patient in Need
